data: {"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3340962,"name":"Question all assumptions, search for truth.","username":"celttechie","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/c/7feea3/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-03-22T21:48:28.254Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eDoes anyone have any tips to get the robot to transition smoothly when using pathfindThenFollowPath?  The pathfinding portion we have set to be fairly fast so it gets to the start of the path quickly, and then the path has a slower max speed constraint to approach the amp without slamming into it.\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eWhat happens, though is it almost stops prior to getting to the start of the path and then accelerateds and decelerates properly to the target.  How can I get the transition to be smoother?\u003c/p\u003e\n\u003cp\u003eOne other note, the path is only about a meter long, just covering the approach to the amp.\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":2,"updated_at":"2024-03-22T21:48:28.254Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":5,"reads":37,"readers_count":36,"score":32.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":459744,"topic_slug":"getting-a-smooth-transition-for-pathfindthenfollowpath","display_username":"Question all assumptions, search for truth.","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":29320,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/getting-a-smooth-transition-for-pathfindthenfollowpath/459744/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3565549,"name":"system","username":"system","avatar_template":"/uploads/default/original/4X/9/3/2/93234578e69f55873c63fc00fe2d0d85f23bce55.png","created_at":"2025-03-22T21:48:38.166Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eThis topic was automatically closed 365 days after the last reply.
